data.text:
Lifetime Friend - Wakin Chau & Jonathan Lee Beijing Concert

Published on Apr 13, 2012

Rating:

Genre: Pop Concert

Dates: Monday, April 30, 2012

Venue: Great Hall of the People

Prices: 280, 480, 680, 980, 1280, 1880

Features: Wakin Chau and Jonathan Lee are both popular Taiwanese artistes, they are also best friend have formed "Super Band". On April 30th, they will hold a concert at Great Hall of the People Beijing.

BRIEF INTRODUCTION

Wakin Chau - Zhou Huajian

Wakin Chau is a Hong Kong-born Taiwanese singer and actor. Chau's popularity has spread throughout Taiwan, Hong Kong, Mainland China, and parts of Southeast Asia. He was known as Emil Chau through the 1980s and 1990s, and by 2000 he reverted to his given name Wakin. As of August 2007, he has released more than 40 albums and held several international concert tours.

Wakin had high hopes to establish a career as a recording artist, and he actively sought out contacts in the music industry. But a persistent lack of interest eventually led him to give up trying to become a performer â instead, he could sign on as an assistant producer at Rock Records, where he wrote marketable pop songs for other artists.

Jonathan Lee - Li Zongsheng

Jonathan Lee is a Taiwanese record producer, singer, and songwriter. Throughout the mid-1980s through the 1990s, he composed song lyrics and melodies for numerous musical artists in the Rock Records label, including Angus Tung, Sarah Chen, Sandy Lam, Sylvia Chang, Winnie Hsin, Tarcy Su, Jeff Chang, Jackie Chan, Chao Chuan, and Wakin Chau.

Lee is hailed as one of the godfathers of Taiwanese Mandopop. He was one of the most successful producers of the 1990s and 2000s and has been credited with building Rock Records into the foremost independent label in Asia. Many songs he wrote for Sarah Chen, Chao Chuan, Sandy Lam, Winnie Hsin, Jeff Chang and Wa Wa Jin Zhijuan became No 1 hits. Lee also produces the occasional solo album for himself and have recorded duets with many of his artistes.

Tickets for Lifetime Friend - Wakin Chau & Jonathan Lee Beijing Concert are Available now!
